name: Anime Club @ UCI
description: Cal Animage Epsilon and home of the Anime Anteaters since 1990! If you like anime and all of its related hobbies — like manga, cosplay, or art — then consider us an ally!

name: Greenwood Anime Society
description: GWAS was made to create a fun and interactive environment for all anime fans at UCR. We are not only a social club, but we're also actively making opportunities for artists, cosplayers, con-goers, and to those who haven't felt the full anime experience. For new and old fans. Est. 1994

name: Japanese Animation Club (JAC)
description: We’re a club dedicated to facilitating both on and off-campus gatherings for the appreciation of Japanese anime and culture! We welcome all anime fans to join us at our club-hosted events and local conventions, to meet with others who share the same passion for art and entertainment.

name: Minna no Anime
location: California Polytechnic State University, San Luis Obispo
description: Welcome to the website of Minna no Anime, the official anime club of California Polytechnic State University in San Luis Obispo! We are a group dedicated to the discussion and enjoyment of animated media. From a continuous weekly show schedule, to social hangouts and events, we are the central coast's go-to club for all things anime!

name: Slug Anime and Manga Association @ UCSC
description: SAMA, short for Slug Anime and Manga Association, is UCSC's anime club! All types of fans of all anime, manga, games, and culture are welcome! We host weekly meetings, events, and artist alleys year-round! Follow us on Instagram or join our Discord server!

name: Trojan Anime Culture
description: University of Southern California's society for the study and promotion of Japanese animation and popular culture. Come join us to discuss anime, manga, and anything else related to Japanese pop culture you're interested in!
